name: Simple Whist
description:
Simple Whist is your favorite trick-taking card game, now 100% free on any iOS device. Challenge intelligent computer opponents to games of Bid Whist or Classic Whist, without worrying about lives, timers, or other limitations. Lead with trump, avoid taking your partner’s tricks, and track cards as you bid your way to victory.

Whist is a popular trick-taking card game that’s closely related to Euchre, Hearts, Spades, and Bridge. Like Spades, Whist is played in pairs using a traditional 52 card deck. The objective is for each partnership to score points by taking tricks in excess of six. The pair with the most points wins.

Enjoy this fun family card game favorite, and download Simple Whist today!

GAME FEATURES

• Play as much as you want, for free
• 2 game modes - Classic and Bid Whist
• Clever computer opponents
• Large, easy to read cards
• 3 levels of difficulty, and 3 game speeds to choose from
• Adjustable win conditions
• Autosave - close the app and retain your progress
• Ability to play offline
